answers.answer: (a modal particle used for elliptical questions)
be born in the year of ... (dog, rooster, etc.)
a kind of apple that tastes like a banana
(used after pronouns 我, 你, 他 or certain nouns to denote plural)
name of a house rental agency
Chinese monetary unit, worth one hundredth of one 块(kuài)
Chinese monetary unit, worth one tenth of one 块(kuài)
(interrogative particle for question expecting yes-no answer)
(a particle used for questions expecting a yes-no answer)
name of a Chinese violin concerto
number of people in a family
(used after a verb to indicate a short, quick, random, informal action)
basic Chinese monetary unit, worth 10 毛(máo)
